I’m back from a wild weekend of driving through Georgia, getting brothers married, and celebrating with friends – maybe a post on that topic is in order. For now, a quick test post of Zooomr, a (relatively) new photo sharing upstart. They seem to be offering free Pro accounts to bloggers, so I guess I’ll take advantage of that (I’ve been a member for a few months) [[via]2 - more info].
